ME.WhyMeTxt: I am motivated to continuously learn new technologies and develop myself. My ability to solve complex problems and my passion for programming make ma a valuable memberof your team.
ME.headline: I am :

RESPONSEMESSAGE.message: Thanks for your message. I’ll respond shortly.

SKILLSET.main: Because there is so much to discover in software development and new ideas are constantly emerging, I feel particularly comfortable in this field. I look forward to continuously learning new things and taking on new challenges.
SKILLSET.challange: am always happy to learn new technonogies,just tell me what you need.

MYWORK.about: Task manager inspired by the Kanban system, designed for creating and organizing tasks. Optimal use through the drag-and-drop feature, which allows for easy assignment of tasks and setting of categories
MYWORK.learned: I learned a variety of skills. My JavaScript knowledge was tested in combination with Firebase, which gave me a whole new understanding of how programming works. Additionally, I learned to organize myself within a team and take responsibility for deadlines.
MYWORK.aboutSecond: A jump-and-run game inspired by popular titles like Super Mario, implemented using object-oriented programming (OOP). Control Pepe, jump through the level, and defeat the final boss to win!
MYWORK.learnedSecond: I have learned the application of OOP and class-based programming to develop a well-designed game with complex tasks such as collision detection.
MYWORK.learnedThird: I have gained extensive knowledge in implementing a login, transmitting data in real-time, and designing an appealing user interface.
MYWORK.aboutThird: DABubble is a chat messenger inspired by Slack. The main focus was to develop a user-friendly messenger using Angular 18, fully compatible with screen readers.
MYWORK.currentWork: I am currently still working on DABubble.

REFERENCES.Andre: Phillip proved to be a reliable and motivated partner during the project work. Thanks to our determined and efficient collaboration, we were able to achieve our project goals in a brief period of time.
REFERENCES.Ricardo: I enjoyed working with Phillip his dedicated, helpful, and reliable nature made every collaboration a positive experience.
REFERENCES.Juliette: Phillip is a team player who works meticulously and is always punctual. His communicative nature makes collaboration enjoyable, and he pursues his goals with passion.
REFERENCES.colleagues: Here what my colleagues said about me

CONTACTFIELD.name: Your name
CONTACTFIELD.secondHalfPolicy: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
CONTACTFIELD.MobileText: If you are looking for someone for your next project, whether it’s a business app or in another direction, and you value clean code as well as a committed developer who is eager to continuously improve and learn new things, then I am the right person for you.

PREFOOTERDESKTOP.headline: Let us work together.
PREFOOTERDESKTOP.mainText: If you are looking for someone for your next project, whether it’s a business app or in another direction, and you value clean code as well as a committed developer who is eager to continuously improve and learn new things, then I am the right person for you.
